content: When @Amélie Fiocca and @Dimitri Szabo mentioned #community > RDA 23rd Plenary Meeting – San José, Costa-Rica and when @Rachel Fernandez mentioned #community > DCMI 2024 I said that for a while I've had a crazy idea that we should list on a website somewhere these conferences where Dataverse people can meet up in person.
For now we have a spreadsheet linked from https://dataverse.org/events

But instead of a spreadsheet, perhaps we could add these meetups to https://www.gdcc.io

It would involve making pull requests to https://github.com/gdcc/www.gdcc.io if people are comfortable with that.
What do you think? :grinning:

Thank you @Philip Durbin 🐉 for the merge of the pull request ;) It was a good exercise for me to discover the organization of structure of gdcc.io project and maybe help for your proposition about the list of upcoming meetups ;)
Wonderful! Yes, please feel free to propose something!
I just mentioned this in the community news: https://groups.google.com/g/dataverse-community/c/Td7xKb80hlI/m/PVwv7t_sAwAJ :grinning:
